title: Enhancing HR Management Practical Competencies: Deep Learning-Based Metasurface Design Practice Integrating Domain Knowledge

context.prior_knowledge: Basic electromagnetics, circuit theory, and deep learning model architecture understanding
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Combining filter-equivalent circuit theory with deep learning models can enhance the metasurface design process by over 30% in efficiency.
Using a VAE (Variational Autoencoder), 3D design parameters can be compressed and optimized into a 2D latent space.
Applying genetic algorithm-based optimization techniques enables the design of broadband/dual-band/band-stop metasurfaces.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
